data.message: leplaisirbkk ; someone kick me out from admin let me insufficient permission

replies.message: Hi Anuvat. Unfortunately Facebook doesn't handle admin disputes. The only way that you will be able to gain a role on the Page is if the current admin grants you an admin role. Please contact the Page's current admin for access: http://bit.ly/2r04okM. -Jessica
Bettina Teñido try mo dto mag report nag rerespond nmn sila agad.

Dear facebook team

Today when I login to my account, for verification they asked passport or birth certificate etc for verification, when I uploaded my exam roll number slip, now my account is blocked and when I search from friend account it shows content not available.

please open my account.

Thanks #Facebook
